Weekly Emails

The Buenos Aires Reality Check

A weekly email about life in Buenos Aires. Real updates on prices, events, and the stuff they don't tell you in the guidebooks.

No spam. Unsubscribe anytime. I respect your inbox.

2,400+ subscribers
Sent every Tuesday
Written by a real person

What You'll Actually Get

Not generic " Buenos Aires is great!" fluff. Real, useful information.

Real Price Updates

I track the blue dollar, inflation, and actual costs so you know what to expect.

Event Recommendations

The stuff worth doing, not the tourist traps. From milongas to underground concerts.

Visa & Bureaucracy News

When rules change, I figure out what it actually means (not just what Migraciones says).

Random Rants

Sometimes I just need to complain about Argentine customer service. You'll relate.

Recent Issues

January 12, 2025

The Blue Dollar Hit 1400: What It Means for You

Plus: My favorite new coffee spot in Palermo and why you should avoid EZE on Friday afternoons.

Summer in the City: Empty Buenos Aires

January is magical here. Also: the best ice cream you haven't tried yet, and a visa update.

December 29, 2024

Surviving the Holidays as an Expat

Christmas alone isn't so bad. Plus: 2025 predictions and my annual 'things I got wrong' list.

These are example topics. Subscribe to get the real thing.

"I started this newsletter because I was tired of outdated blog posts and Facebook groups full of misinformation. I wanted a place to share what's actually happening right now in Buenos Aires."
M

Mike

Living in Buenos Aires since 2022

Questions?

Is this really free?

Yes, completely free. I make money through the Lucero Legal partnership and occasional affiliate links, not by charging for the newsletter.

What if I want to unsubscribe?

Every email has an unsubscribe link at the bottom. No hard feelings, no guilt trip. I get it - inboxes are overwhelming.

Do you sell my email?

Never. Your email stays with me. I use a reputable email service (ConvertKit) and follow all privacy laws.
